creator: Avenhel
descriptionHtml:
App features:

- Glitter Wallpapers
- 100+ New Wallpapers
- Cool and trendy images of glitter
- HD images
- No internet required to load the images
- Optimized battery usage
- Download wallpapers for free
- Compatible with most mobile phones and devices
- Optimized very fast and easy to use

and many more!!

How to use:
Home-->Select Wallpapers-->Set As Wallpaper

Several Categories:

Glitter Background and Wallpaper
Glitter Themes HD
Cool Glitter Wallpaper
Glitter Wallpaper Art
Glitter Wallpaper Vector
Glitter Wallpaper Cartoon
Glitter Wallpaper Character
Glitter and friends Wallpaper HD
Glitter Wallpaper 4k
Live Glitter Wallpaper
Astronaut Wallpaper
Girly Wallpaper
Cute Wallpaper
Black Wallpaper
....

Thank you for downloading our app, do not forget to rate if you love us.
We hope you love it.
